==Descriptions==
{{Description|"As I was exploring by myself, I discovered this waterway. The waters here are clean and cool, perfect for taking a break and wash all the ill-fortune accumulated on the way off."<br />"There are some gentle elemental creatures nearby who move most slowly, rare beings who have no quarrel with the rest of the world...
